short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk URL Opener Plus Extension just lets you open multiple URLs at once (in new tabs or windows)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and easy to use extension which allows the user to open a list of URL's in 1-click. 

Bulk URL Opener Plus Extension just lets you open multiple URLs at once (in new tabs or windows). 


[FEATURES]
- Open each URL in new tab/window
- Allows users to manage lists of URLs easily
- Delay on opening the next link
- Auto close when opened
- Focus opened tabs
- Skip duplicate links

.
.
.
